text: Arctotheca prostrata is a plant in the sunflower family native to Cape Province in South Africa.Gibbs Russell, G. E., W. G. M. Welman, E. Retief, K. L. Immelman, G. Germishuizen, B. J. Pienaar, M. Van Wyk & A. Nicholas. 1987. List of species of southern African plants. Memoirs of the Botanical Survey of South Africa 2(1–2): 1–152(pt. 1), 1–270(pt. 2). Common names include Prostrate Cape weed and Creeping Bear's-ear. It is listed as an invasive weed in California and Australia.Calflora taxon report, University of California @ Berkeley, Arctotheca prostrata (Salisb.) Britten, Prostrate Cape weed Atlas of Living Australia, Arctotheca prostrata (Salisb.) Britten, Creeping Bear's-ear ==References== Category:Arctotideae Category:Flora of South Africa Category:Flora naturalised in Australia
title: Arctotheca prostrata
